   19: %%
   20: -module(repeat_1_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% @spec suite() -> Info
   28: %% Info = [tuple()]
   29: %% @end
   30: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   31: suite() ->
   32:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}].
   33: 
   34: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   35: %% @spec init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   36: %%     Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   37: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   38: %% Reason = term()
   39: %% @end
   40: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   41: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   42:     spawn(fun() -> db() end),
   43:     Config.
   44: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   45: %% @spec end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   46: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   47: %% @end
   48: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   49: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   50:     db(stop, ok),
   51:     ok.
   52: 
   53: db() ->
   54:     register(?MODULE, self()),
   55:     db_loop([]).
   56: 
   57: db_loop(Dict) ->
   58:     receive
   59: 	{insert,From,Key,Val} ->
   60: 	    From ! {?MODULE,ok},
   61: 	    db_loop([{Key,Val} | proplists:delete(Key, Dict)]);
   62: 	{lookup,From,Key}  ->
   63: 	    From ! {?MODULE,proplists:get_value(Key, Dict)},
   64: 	    db_loop(Dict);
   65: 	{delete,From,Key} ->
   66: 	    From ! {?MODULE,ok},
   67: 	    db_loop(proplists:delete(Key, Dict));
   68: 	{stop,From,_} ->
   69: 	    From ! {?MODULE,ok}
   70:     end.
   71: 
   72:  db(Op, Key, Val) ->
   73:     ?MODULE ! {Op,self(),Key,Val},
   74:     receive {?MODULE,Result} -> Result end.
   75: 
   76:  db(Op, Key) ->
   77:     ?MODULE ! {Op,self(),Key},
   78:     receive {?MODULE,Result} -> Result end.
   79: 
   80: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   81: %% @spec init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   82: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   83: %% GroupName = atom()
   84: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   85: %% Reason = term()
   86: %% @end
   87: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   88: init_per_group(G, Config) when G == gr_ok_1 ; G == gr_ok_2 ;
   89: 			       G == gr_fail_result;
   90: 			       G == gr_ok_then_fail_result ->
   91:     ct:comment(G),
   92:     Config;
   93: 
   94: init_per_group(G, _Config) when G == gr_fail_init ->
   95:     ct:comment(G),
   96:     exit(fails_on_purpose);
   97: 
   98: init_per_group(G, Config) when G == gr_ok_then_fail_init ->
   99:     ct:comment(G),
  100:     do_2nd_time(G,
  101: 		fun() -> exit(failing_this_time) end,
  102: 		fun() -> Config end);
  103: 
  104: init_per_group(G, Config) when G == gr_fail_init_then_ok ->
  105:     ct:comment(G),
  106:     do_2nd_time(G,
  107: 		fun() -> Config end,
  108: 		fun() -> exit(failing_this_time) end);
  109: 
  110: init_per_group(G, Config) ->
  111:     ct:comment(G),
  112:     Config.
  113: 
  114: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  115: %% @spec end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
  116: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
  117: %% GroupName = atom()
  118: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  119: %% @end
  120: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  121: end_per_group(G, _Config) when G == gr_fail_result ->
  122:     ct:comment(G),
  123:     {return_group_result,failed};
  124: 
  125: end_per_group(G, _Config) when G == gr_ok_then_fail_result ->
  126:     ct:comment(G),
  127:     do_2nd_time(G,
  128: 		fun() -> {return_group_result,failed} end,
  129: 		fun() -> ok end);
  130: 
  131: end_per_group(G, _Config) when G == gr_fail_result_then_ok ->
  132:     ct:comment(G),
  133:     do_2nd_time(G,
  134: 		fun() -> ok end,
  135: 		fun() -> {return_group_result,failed} end);
  136: 
  137: end_per_group(G, _Config) ->
  138:     ct:comment(G),
  139:     ok.
  140: 
  141: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  142: %% @spec init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
  143: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
  144: %% TestCase = atom()
  145: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  146: %% Reason = term()
  147: %% @end
  148: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  149: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  150:     Config.
  151: 
  152: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  153: %% @spec end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
  154: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1} | {fail,Reason}
  155: %% TestCase = atom()
  156: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  157: %% Reason = term()
  158: %% @end
  159: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  160: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
  161:     ok.
  162: 
  163: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  164: %% @spec groups() -> [Group]
  165: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
  166: %% GroupName = atom()
  167: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
  168: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  169: %% TestCase = atom()
  170: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
  171: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
  172: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
  173: %% N = integer() | forever
  174: %% @end
  175: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  176: groups() ->
  177:     [
  178:      %%---------------------------------------------------------------
  179:      {repeat_cs, [], [{group,repeat_cs_0},
  180: 		      {group,repeat_cs_1},
  181: 		      {group,repeat_cs_2}]},
  182:      {repeat_cs_0, [{repeat,0}], [tc_ok_1,tc_ok_2]},
  183:      {repeat_cs_1, [{repeat,1}], [tc_ok_1,tc_ok_2]},
  184:      {repeat_cs_2, [{repeat,2}], [tc_ok_1,tc_ok_2]},
  185: 
  186:      {repeat_cs_and_grs, [{repeat,2}], [{group,gr_ok_1},tc_fail_1,
  187: 					{group,gr_fail_result},tc_ok_1,
  188: 					{group,gr_fail_init},tc_ok_2]},
  189: 
  190:      %%---------------------------------------------------------------
  191:      {repeat_seq, [], [{group,repeat_seq_1},
  192: 		       {group,repeat_seq_2},
  193: 		       {group,repeat_seq_3},
  194: 		       {group,repeat_seq_4}]},
  195:      {repeat_seq_1, [sequence,{repeat,2}], [tc_ok_1,tc_fail_1,tc_ok_2]},
  196:      {repeat_seq_2, [sequence,{repeat,2}], [tc_ok_1,{group,gr_fail_result},tc_ok_2]},
  197:      {repeat_seq_3, [sequence,{repeat,2}], [tc_ok_1,{group,gr_fail_init},tc_ok_2]},
  198:      {repeat_seq_4, [sequence,{repeat,2}], [tc_fail_1,{group,gr_ok_1},tc_ok_1]},
  199: 
  200:      %%---------------------------------------------------------------
  201:      {repeat_cs_until_any_ok, [], [{group,repeat_cs_until_any_ok_1},
  202: 				   {group,repeat_cs_until_any_ok_2}]},
  203:      {repeat_cs_until_any_ok_1, [{repeat_until_any_ok,3}], [tc_fail_1,
  204: 							    tc_fail_2,
  205: 							    tc_fail_then_ok_1]},
  206:      {repeat_cs_until_any_ok_2, [{repeat_until_any_ok,3}], [tc_ok_1,tc_fail_1]},
  207: 
  208:      %%---------------------------------------------------------------
  209:      {repeat_gr_until_any_ok, [], [{group,repeat_gr_until_any_ok_1},
  210: 				   {group,repeat_gr_until_any_ok_2}]},
  211:      {repeat_gr_until_any_ok_1, [{repeat_until_any_ok,3}],
  212:       [{group,gr_fail_result}, tc_fail_1, {group,gr_fail_init}, tc_fail_2,
  213:        {group,gr_fail_result_then_ok}]},
  214:      {repeat_gr_until_any_ok_2, [{repeat_until_any_ok,3}],
  215:       [{group,gr_fail_result}, tc_fail_1, tc_fail_then_ok_1,
  216:        {group,gr_fail_init}]},
  217: 
  218:      %%---------------------------------------------------------------
  219:      {repeat_cs_until_any_fail, [], [{group,repeat_cs_until_any_fail_1},
  220: 				     {group,repeat_cs_until_any_fail_2}]},
  221:      {repeat_cs_until_any_fail_1, [{repeat_until_any_fail,3}], [tc_ok_1,
  222: 								tc_ok_2,
  223: 								tc_ok_then_fail_1]},
  224:      {repeat_cs_until_any_fail_2, [{repeat_until_any_fail,3}], [tc_fail_1,tc_fail_2]},
  225: 
  226:      %%---------------------------------------------------------------
  227:      {repeat_gr_until_any_fail, [], [{group,repeat_gr_until_any_fail_1},
  228: 				     {group,repeat_gr_until_any_fail_2},
  229: 				     {group,repeat_gr_until_any_fail_3}]},
  230:      {repeat_gr_until_any_fail_1, [{repeat_until_any_fail,3}],
  231:       [{group,gr_ok_1}, tc_ok_1, {group,gr_ok_then_fail_result}, tc_ok_2]},
  232:      {repeat_gr_until_any_fail_2, [{repeat_until_any_fail,3}],
  233:       [{group,gr_ok_1}, tc_ok_1, {group,gr_ok_then_fail_init}, tc_ok_2]},
  234:      {repeat_gr_until_any_fail_3, [{repeat_until_any_fail,3}], [tc_ok_then_fail_1,
  235: 								{group,gr_ok_1},
  236: 								tc_ok_1]},
  237: 
  238:      %%---------------------------------------------------------------
  239:      {repeat_cs_until_all_ok, [], [{group,repeat_cs_until_all_ok_1},
  240: 				   {group,repeat_cs_until_all_ok_2}]},
  241:      {repeat_cs_until_all_ok_1, [{repeat_until_all_ok,3}], [tc_fail_then_ok_1,
  242: 							    tc_ok_1,
  243: 							    tc_fail_then_ok_2]},
  244:      {repeat_cs_until_all_ok_2, [{repeat_until_all_ok,3}], [tc_ok_1,tc_ok_2]},
  245: 
  246:      %%---------------------------------------------------------------
  247:      {repeat_gr_until_all_ok, [], [{group,repeat_gr_until_all_ok_1},
  248: 				   {group,repeat_gr_until_all_ok_2},
  249: 				   {group,repeat_gr_until_all_ok_3}]},
  250:      {repeat_gr_until_all_ok_1, [{repeat_until_all_ok,3}],
  251:       [tc_ok_1, {group,gr_ok_1}, tc_fail_then_ok_1, {group,gr_fail_result_then_ok}]},
  252:      {repeat_gr_until_all_ok_2, [{repeat_until_all_ok,3}],
  253:       [{group,gr_fail_init_then_ok}, tc_ok_1]},
  254:      {repeat_gr_until_all_ok_3, [{repeat_until_all_ok,3}],
  255:       [{group,gr_ok_1}, tc_fail_then_ok_1]},
  256: 
  257:      %%---------------------------------------------------------------
  258:      {repeat_cs_until_all_fail, [], [{group,repeat_cs_until_all_fail_1},
  259: 				     {group,repeat_cs_until_all_fail_2}]},
  260:      {repeat_cs_until_all_fail_1, [{repeat_until_all_fail,3}], [tc_ok_then_fail_1,
  261: 								tc_fail_1,
  262: 								tc_ok_then_fail_2]},
  263:      {repeat_cs_until_all_fail_2, [{repeat_until_all_fail,3}], [tc_fail_1]},
  264: 
  265:      %%---------------------------------------------------------------
  266:      {repeat_gr_until_all_fail, [], [{group,repeat_gr_until_all_fail_1},
  267: 				     {group,repeat_gr_until_all_fail_2},
  268: 				     {group,repeat_gr_until_all_fail_3}]},
  269:      {repeat_gr_until_all_fail_1, [{repeat_until_all_fail,3}],
  270:       [tc_fail_1, {group,gr_fail_init}, tc_ok_then_fail_1, {group,gr_ok_then_fail_result}]},
  271:      {repeat_gr_until_all_fail_2, [{repeat_until_all_fail,3}],
  272:       [{group,gr_ok_then_fail_init}, tc_fail_1]},
  273:      {repeat_gr_until_all_fail_3, [{repeat_until_all_fail,3}],
  274:       [{group,gr_fail_result}, tc_ok_then_fail_1]},
  275: 
  276:      %%---------------------------------------------------------------
  277:      {repeat_seq_until_any_fail, [], [{group,repeat_seq_until_any_fail_1},
  278: 				      {group,repeat_seq_until_any_fail_2},
  279: 				      {group,repeat_seq_until_any_fail_3},
  280: 				      {group,repeat_seq_until_any_fail_4},
  281: 				      {group,repeat_seq_until_any_fail_5}]},
  282:      {repeat_seq_until_any_fail_1, [sequence,{repeat_until_any_fail,2}],
  283:       [tc_ok_1, tc_ok_2]},
  284:      {repeat_seq_until_any_fail_2, [{repeat_until_any_fail,2},sequence],
  285:       [tc_ok_1, {group,gr_ok_1}, tc_ok_2]},
  286:      {repeat_seq_until_any_fail_3, [sequence,{repeat_until_any_fail,3}],
  287:       [tc_ok_1, tc_ok_then_fail_1, tc_ok_2, {group,gr_ok_1}]},
  288:      {repeat_seq_until_any_fail_4, [{repeat_until_any_fail,3},sequence],
  289:       [{group,gr_ok_then_fail_result}, {group,gr_ok_1}, tc_ok_1]},
  290:      {repeat_seq_until_any_fail_5, [{repeat_until_any_fail,3},sequence],
  291:       [{group,gr_ok_1}, {group,gr_ok_then_fail_init}, {group,gr_ok_2}, tc_ok_1]},
  292: 
  293:      %%---------------------------------------------------------------
  294:      {repeat_shuffled_seq_until_any_fail, [], [{group,repeat_shuffled_seq_until_any_fail_1},
  295: 					       {group,repeat_shuffled_seq_until_any_fail_2},
  296: 					       {group,repeat_shuffled_seq_until_any_fail_3},
  297: 					       {group,repeat_shuffled_seq_until_any_fail_4},
  298: 					       {group,repeat_shuffled_seq_until_any_fail_5}]},
  299:      {repeat_shuffled_seq_until_any_fail_1, [sequence,shuffle,{repeat_until_any_fail,2}],
  300:       [tc_ok_1, tc_ok_2]},
  301:      {repeat_shuffled_seq_until_any_fail_2, [{repeat_until_any_fail,2},{shuffle,{1,2,3}},sequence],
  302:       [tc_ok_1, {group,gr_ok_1}, tc_ok_2]},
  303:      {repeat_shuffled_seq_until_any_fail_3, [shuffle,sequence,{repeat_until_any_fail,3}],
  304:       [tc_ok_1, tc_ok_then_fail_1, tc_ok_2, {group,gr_ok_1}]},
  305:      {repeat_shuffled_seq_until_any_fail_4, [{repeat_until_any_fail,3},sequence,{shuffle,{1,2,3}}],
  306:       [{group,gr_ok_then_fail_result}, {group,gr_ok_1}, tc_ok_1]},
  307:      {repeat_shuffled_seq_until_any_fail_5, [{repeat_until_any_fail,3},sequence,{shuffle,{1,2,3}}],
  308:       [{group,gr_ok_1}, {group,gr_ok_then_fail_init}, {group,gr_ok_2}, tc_ok_1]},
  309: 
  310:      %%---------------------------------------------------------------
  311:      {gr_ok_1, [], [tc_ok_1]},
  312: 
  313:      {gr_ok_2, [], [tc_ok_1]},
  314: 
  315:      {gr_fail_init, [], [tc_ok_1]},
  316: 
  317:      {gr_fail_result, [], [tc_ok_1]},
  318: 
  319:      {gr_ok_then_fail_init, [], [tc_ok_1]},
  320: 
  321:      {gr_ok_then_fail_result, [], [tc_ok_1]},
  322: 
  323:      {gr_fail_result_then_ok, [], [tc_ok_1]},
  324: 
  325:      {gr_fail_init_then_ok, [], [tc_ok_1]}
  326:     ].
  327: 
  328: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  329: %% @spec all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
  330: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  331: %% GroupName = atom()
  332: %% TestCase = atom()
  333: %% Reason = term()
  334: %% @end
  335: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  336: all() ->
  337:     [].
  338: 
  339: tc_ok_1(_) ->
  340:     ok.
  341: 
  342: tc_ok_2(_) ->
  343:     ok.
  344: 
  345: tc_fail_1(_) ->
  346:     x=2.
  347: 
  348: tc_fail_2(_) ->
  349:     exit(exit_on_purpose).
  350: 
  351: tc_ok_then_fail_1(_) ->
  352:     do_2nd_time(tc_ok_then_fail_1,
  353: 		fun() -> exit(failing_this_time) end,
  354: 		fun() -> ok end),
  355:     ok.
  356: 
  357: tc_ok_then_fail_2(_) ->
  358:     do_2nd_time(tc_ok_then_fail_2,
  359: 		fun() -> exit(failing_this_time) end,
  360: 		fun() -> ok end),
  361:     ok.
  362: 
  363: tc_fail_then_ok_1(_) ->
  364:     do_2nd_time(tc_fail_then_ok_1,
  365: 		fun() -> ok end,
  366: 		fun() -> exit(failing_this_time) end),
  367:     ok.
  368: 
  369: tc_fail_then_ok_2(_) ->
  370:     do_2nd_time(tc_fail_then_ok_2,
  371: 		fun() -> ok end,
  372: 		fun() -> exit(failing_this_time) end),
  373:     ok.
  374: 
  375: do_2nd_time(Case, True, False) ->
  376:     case db(lookup, Case) of
  377: 	undefined ->
  378: 	    db(insert, Case, 1),
  379: 	    False();
  380: 	1 ->
  381: 	    ct:log("This is the second call...", []),
  382: 	    db(delete, Case),
  383: 	    True()
  384:     end.
